jobDescription: Job Title: Senior Data AnalystJob Type: W2Position ID: NAV01474Post Date: 06/21/2018Location : Herndon VASkills : Data analyst,Data mapping and SQL,Documenting data requirements,Source to target mappings,Dta interfaces,InformaticaRoles & Responsibilities  Duties and Responsibilities :  In this role, you will work with a risk management applications that are  data-centric with a lot of emphases given to analytics, reporting, and  financial modeling. You will assist in the overall effort to replace these  applications. Required qualifications:6-8 years working experience as a data analystStrong knowledge of and experience with data mapping and SQLStrong knowledge of and experience with working on multiple applications and establishing data interfaces Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and  accuracy Should have skills documenting data requirementsAbility to translate ETL requirements (source to target mappings)Ability to document business processesExcellent communication skillsAbility to multitask is criticalEducation: BS Degree in Computer Science  Note: ETL experience is not a must have but a nice to have would be Informatica.
